{"id":1052239727,"question_id":2953,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1695002946,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"336 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1052239727/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Pairs of Points With Distance k","memory":"57.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countPairs(List<List<Integer>> coordinates, int k) {\n        int n = coordinates.size();\n        \n        int ret = 0;\n        for (int a = 0; a<=k; a++)\n        {\n            HashMap<Long, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n            \n            for (int i=0; i<n; i++)\n            {\n                int x1 = coordinates.get(i).get(0);\n                int y1 = coordinates.get(i).get(1);\n                int x2 = a^x1;\n                int y2 = (k-a)^y1;\n                \n                long code = (long)x2*10000000 + y2;              \n                \n                if(map.containsKey(code)){\n                    ret += map.get(code);\n                }\n                \n                \n                code = (long)x1*10000000 + y1;\n                \n                map.put(code ,map.getOrDefault(code, 0)+1);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return ret;\n    }\n}\n\n\n// k = a + b\n// a = x1 ^ x2 => x2 = a ^ x1\n// b = y1 ^ y2 => y2 = b ^ y1 => y2 = (k-a)^y1","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-pairs-of-points-with-distance-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
